title: Hypertext Page
description: A hypertext page that is part of a web site or mobile web site. Hypertext pages are modular (consist of smaller content fragments), hyperlinked (link to other pages), and include digital assets (like images or videos)

path.description: Shows the hierarchy of the page. The path semantics should be same as that defined in [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3.3). In case a repository is not path based then it can return the information which will help in browsing. It could be just an document id, or something like `{catalog}/{id}` in case of a document database.

name.description: Name of the page in the repository. This could be a file name or any name provided by the repository to the page.

short_title.description: Short title of the page that is suitable to be displayed in navigation links.

hidden_in_navigation.description: Indicates if this page should be hidden by default in navigational collections.

template.description: The template that was used to create this page.

language.description: Specifies the language of this page. the language property should conform to BPC 47, for example `en-GB`

created_date.description: The server date and time when the resource was created in the repository, such as when an page file is first uploaded or a directory is created by the server as the parent of a new page. The Date Time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

created_by.description: ID of the user who initiated the action that caused the resource to be created in the repository.

last_modified_date.description: The server date and time when the resource was most recently modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an page is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The Date Time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

last_modified_by.description: ID of the user who initiated the action that most recently caused the resource to be modified in the repository.

Residuals.description: Defines the set of residual properties allowed on a page or component.

Container.description: Acts as container for other components.

type.description: Type of the container. acts as processing hint for the client.

itemsOrder.description: Defines the order of the items in the container. can be omitted if the order is not important.

Component.description: Acts as generic typed component that can have any arbitrary properties.

type.description: Type of the component. acts as processing hint for the client.
